phone.title: Phone Freedom Protocol
phone.description: Create physical and digital barriers to mindless phone usage
steps: Place phone in another room or drawer
Turn on Do Not Disturb mode
Remove social media apps from home screen
Set specific times for checking messages
Use airplane mode during focus sessions

tv.title: Screen Discipline System
tv.description: Transform your entertainment consumption into intentional choices
steps: Hide the TV remote in inconvenient location
Unplug streaming devices
Set a specific viewing schedule
Choose content beforehand, not while browsing
Create a "no-screen" zone in your workspace

snacking.title: Mindful Consumption Reset
snacking.description: Replace mindless eating with intentional nourishment
steps: Remove trigger foods from immediate reach
Prepare healthy alternatives in advance
Drink water before eating anything
Set designated eating times
Practice the 5-minute hunger check

messaging.title: Communication Boundaries
messaging.description: Control when and how you engage with messages
steps: Turn off all message notifications
Set specific times for checking messages
Use auto-replies explaining your response time
Leave non-essential group chats
Put messaging apps in hard-to-reach folders

instagram.title: Social Media Detox
instagram.description: Break the infinite scroll addiction cycle
steps: Log out of all accounts
Delete apps from phone completely
Use website blockers on all devices
Replace with productive alternatives
Find an accountability partner

youtube.title: Intentional Learning
youtube.description: Transform random watching into purposeful education
steps: Clear watch history and turn off recommendations
Subscribe only to educational channels
Set a specific learning goal before opening
Use timer for maximum watch time
Take notes while watching to stay engaged

shopping.title: Purchase Control System
shopping.description: Eliminate impulse buying and mindless browsing
steps: Remove saved payment methods from browsers
Uninstall shopping apps
Create a 24-hour rule for all purchases
Make a specific shopping list before browsing
Block shopping websites during work hours

gaming.title: Gaming Discipline
gaming.description: Control gaming time and make it intentional
steps: Set specific gaming hours in advance
Use parental controls or time limits
Keep gaming devices in inconvenient locations
Find offline hobbies to replace gaming time
Join communities focused on productive activities
